getReturn().Description: Returns the future for the return value

Parameters: Script.FieldID: the field ID for the global variable
getGlobal(android.support.v8.renderscrip.Description: Returns the future for a global variable

ClassDesc: An opaque class for closures A closure represents a function call to a kernel or invocable function, combined with arguments and values for global variables. A closure is created using the @B_android#support#v8#renderscript#ScriptGroup#Builder2#addKernel_E@ or @B_android#support#v8#renderscript#ScriptGroup#Builder2#addInvoke_E@ method.
